public timeout(due: number, scheduler: Scheduler): Observable<R> | WebSocketSubject<T> | Observable<T> Copy åœ¨æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´é—´éš”å†…ä¸å‘å‡ºå€¼å°±æŠ¥é”™ // RxJS v6+import { of } from "rxjs";import { concatMap, timeout, catchError, delay } from "rxjs/operators";// æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè¯·æ±‚function makeRequest(timeToDelay) { return of("Request Complete!").pipe(delay(timeToDelay));}of(4000, 3000, 2000) .pipe( concatMap(duration => makeRequest(duration).pipe( timeout(2500), catchError(error => of(`Request timed out after: ${duration}`)) ) ) ) /* * "Request timed out after: 4000" * "Request timed out after: 3000" * "Request Complete!" */ .subscribe(val => console.log(val)); Copy
